ComicInfo.Series: Warren Ellis' Anna Mercury Artbook: The New Ataraxia Mission
ComicInfo.Summary: The Warren Ellis smash-hit series has turned Anna Mercury into everyone's favorite red-head with an attitude! Now this full-color Artbook gives the best artists in the industry a chance to draw the leather-clad vixen in gorgeous never-before-seen pinups straight from her New Ataraxia Mission! This will be the only chance to glimpse this mystery woman before her next series starts Summer 2009! Super-starts delivering works of art inside include Juan Jose Ryp, Paul Duffield, Tim Seeley, Matt Martin, Richard Ortiz, and a huge selection of new work from series artist Facundo Percio! This book is available with a regular cover by Facundo Percio, a wraparound cover by Richard Ortiz, a painted cover by Felipe Massafera, and a rare Design Sketch cover by Percio!
